subject: docs(setup): create all documentation files from CLAUDE.md spec
body:
Creates the docs/ directory and all documentation files referenced in
CLAUDE.md: SESSION_NOTES.md, TODO.md, HISTORY.md, USER_ACTIONS.md,
AI_MISTAKES.md, EXTRACTION_PLAYBOOK.md, USER_GUIDE.md, TESTING_GUIDE.md.

Each file includes its purpose header and initial placeholder content
per the documentation standards defined in CLAUDE.md.

Tags: setup, docs
Complexity: 1
Urgency: 2
Impact: infrastructure
Risk: low
Debt: neutral
Epic: project-setup
Semver: minor
title: create all documentation files from CLAUDE.md spec
